name: Everlasting Summer: Pioneer Without Original
description:
Have you ever wondered what place in "Owlet" is occupied by one very talkative and no less cheerful pioneer named Miku? How does she live, what does she think about, and what is she capable of in difficult moments of her life? If not, then it's time to think, and this story will help you with this! Because here the main character is none other than Miku! Yes Yes!

Life in the camp goes on as usual, but one day Miku has a reason to doubt the normalcy of the things around her. She learns that not everything in "Owlet" is as simple as it seems. One oddity replaces another. And all this begins to happen almost simultaneously with the appearance in the camp of a mysterious newcomer named Semyon. Miku aims to understand the mysteries of the "Owlet" and find out the whole truth about this pioneer camp and about herself. But will she withstand all the tests that await her? This is what you have to learn in the "Pioneer without Original" mod!
